tossup_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three quantities that are quantized: 1) Atoms of H2O in a beaker; 2) Frequencies of light emitted by an excited atom; 3) Charge stored on a parallel-plate capacitor.
bonus_question: -   –  Consider the set of quantum numbers, -1, 0, and 1. Which one or ones could be found in a hydrogen atom wave function in which the principle quantum number is equal to 2 and the orbital or angular momentum quantum number is equal to 1?
